DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Predefined generic types for a space that are specified in an enumeration. There might be property sets defined specifically for each predefined type.
NOTE  Previous use had been to indicates whether the IfcSpace is an interior space by value INTERNAL, or an exterior space by value EXTERNAL. This use is now deprecated, the property 'IsExternal' at 'Pset_SpaceCommon' should be used instead.
IFC4 CHANGE  The attribute has been renamed from ExteriorOrInteriorSpace with upward compatibility for file based exchange.

DocAttribute.Name: ElevationWithFlooring
DocAttribute.Documentation: Level of flooring of this space; the average shall be taken, if the space ground surface is sloping or if there are level differences within this space.

DocAttribute.Name: HasCoverings
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Reference to IfcCovering by virtue of the objectified relationship IfcRelCoversSpaces. It defines the concept of a space having coverings assigned. Those coverings may represent different flooring, or tiling areas.
NOTE  Coverings are often managed by the space, and not by the building element, which they cover.
IFC2x Edition3 CHANGE  New inverse relationship. Upward compatibility for file based exchange is guaranteed.

DocAttribute.Name: BoundedBy
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to a set of IfcRelSpaceBoundary's that defines the physical or virtual delimitation of that space against physical or virtual boundaries.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the PredefinedType attribute is unset (e.g. because an IfcSpaceType is associated), or the inherited attribute ObjectType shall be provided, if the PredefinedType is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcSpaceTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcSpaceTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS (SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either there is no space type object associated, i.e. the IsTypedBy inverse relationship is not provided, or the associated type object has to be of type IfcSpaceType.
